    Omar Alam

    • Constructor Detail

      • StereographicProject

        public StereographicProject(LatLon center,
                            double radius,
                            double scaleFactor)
        Initialize a stereographic projection with specified parameters
        Parameters:
        center - center of the projection (Projection pole).
        radius - radius of the earth to use for projection.
        scaleFactor - scale factor used for projection calculations
